summary: Winner of r/SkyrimMods Bossfight competition. Enter the Lifeless Vaults. Face and defeat 5 Dark Souls inspired bosses with specific music tracks for each by Alex Roe. A varied, non-linear dungeon crawl with multiple routes, traps and leveled enemies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://][/url][color=#e69138][b][size=5][font=Trebuchet MS][u][/u][/font][/size][/b][/color][/center][center][color=#e69138][b][size=5][font=Trebuchet MS][u]1st[/u][/font]
[u][font=Trebuchet MS]Place Winner[/font][/u][/size]

[size=6] [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/wiki/contest_archive][img]http://s9.postimg.org/63npijrb3/r_Skyrim_Mods.png[/img][/url]
[/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][u]Boss Battles[/u][/size][/font][/b]
[size=6][b] Competition[/b][/size][/color][font=Tahoma][color=#f6b26b][b] 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/LNVUqVM.jpg[/img]
[/b][/color][/font][font=Tahoma][color=#f6b26b][b]
[/b][/color][/font][youtube]ttLG0G4Rbc8[/youtube][b][youtube]qHgkGN2LCvc[/youtube]

[/b][b]
[/b][b][color=#e69138][size=5]Description[/size][/color][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][i]Head into a custom built Dwarven Ruin to retrieve an elder scroll. 
A mod with 5 Dark Souls inspired Bossfights with new music by[url=http://bit.ly/1EjsN34][color=#e69138] [/color][/url][color=#e69138][url=https://www.youtube.com/user/RoeTaKa][color=#e69138]Alex Roe[/color][/url].[/color][/i][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][i][color=#e69138]
[/color][/i][/size][/font][b][size=4]

This is a demo for[color=#ff7700] [/color][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2421514-apotheosis-a-new-kind-of-quest-voice-actors-needed/][color=#e69138][/color][/url][url=http://www.moddb.com/mods/apotheosis][/url][url=http://www.moddb.com/mods/apotheosis][color=#e69138]Apotheosis[/color][/url][color=#e69138].[/color][color=#e69138]
[/color][/size][/b][size=3]Follow the links to learn more. 
[/size][b]
[b][color=#e69138][size=5]Links[/size][/color]
[b][size=4][url=http://www.moddb.com/mods/apotheosis]Moddb
[/url][b][b][color=#3c78d8][size=4] [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2421514-apotheosis-a-new-kind-of-quest-voice-actors-needed/]VA Forums[/url][/size][/color][/b][/b]
[/size][/b][size=4][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLFu_H8kBUwyXC0mAjChgSw?&ab_channel=-Di0nysus-]Youtube[/url]
[/size]
[/b]
[color=#e69138][size=5][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color]
[b][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]Bethesda's Official DLC's 
[/size][/color][/b](Dawnguard, Dragonborn, Hearthfires)
[/b][b][color=#e69138][size=5][b][b][color=#e69138][size=5][b]
Artifacts
[/b][/size][/color][/b][/b][/size][/color][/b][b][size=3]- The legendary hammer Sunder from TES III: Morrowind 
- The Guardian Staff: Summon a Dwemer Gatekeeper for 60 seconds. 

[/size][/b][b]

[color=#e69138][size=5]How to start the quest? [/size][/color]
[/b][size=3][b]Head over to Windhelm before the bridge crossing on the way from Whiterun. [/b]
[b]Look for a corpse laying by a dead horse. [/b]
[b] A note on the body will show you the way. [/b]
[/size][b][size=4]
[/size][color=#e69138][size=5]Conflicts[/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=3]None reported[/size]
[size=2](Verified for ITM/UDR records and Error checked)
[/size][/b][size=5]
[/size][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][color=#e69138][size=5]Installation[/size][/color]
[b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][size=3][color=#00ff00]Manually extract the files into Skyrim/Data[/color][color=#0000ff] [/color]
[/size][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][b]or
[b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][b][size=3][color=#00ff00]Install using [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o3po0b9g3Cw&ab_channel=Gopher]Mod Organizer[/url] or [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rAKcAEn6hLg&ab_channel=Gopher]Nexus Mod Manager[/url][/color][/size][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b]

[/b][color=#e69138][size=5][b]Highly Recommended[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20923/?]Tk-Dodge[/url] [/b][b][b][b]
[/b][/b][/b][/size]

[size=5][b][color=#e69138]Music[/color][color=#ff7700] [/color][/b][/size][size=3] [/size]

[b]by[size=4] [/size][size=5]Alex Roe [/size][/b]

[youtube]PQcYZ927mXo[/youtube]

[b]by [size=5]Alex Roe[/size][/b]

[youtube]YNxcs2dzqS0[/youtube]

[b]by [size=5]Alex Roe[/size][/b]

[youtube]z_uuEVcuZuw[/youtube]

[b]Bloodborne "Beckon a Foul Beast" (Original song inspired by Bloodborne)[/b]
[b]by [size=5]Alex Roe[/size][/b]

[youtube]ukywVcxv5r4[/youtube]


[color=#e69138][size=4][b]Patch Notes [/b][/size][/color]
2.0.0 -  27 February 2016 (Latest)
[color=#00ff00]- Added Sunder with enchantment equivalent to it's Morrowind counterpart.
- Added the Guardian Staff which summons a Giant Gatekeeper for 60 seconds. 
- Fixed minor lighting issues. 
- Adjusted Boss AI
- Adjusted Dwarven Gatekeeper model
- Various tweaks to music system
- Added shortcut to end area facilitating dungeon flow
- Various other minor tweaks[/color]

[size=2]1.7.5 - 5 August 8/5/2015 [/size]
[size=2]Hotfix for one Mesh path error[/size]
[size=2](fixes missing model for second boss)[/size]

[size=2]1.7.0 - 1 August 8/1/2015[/size]
[size=2]Added lever for elevator access in main entry room[/size]
[size=2]Edited loot placement/ added loot in certain areas[/size]
[size=2]Slight edits to enemy placement[/size]
[size=2]Minor edits to 2nd Boss Room[/size]
[size=2]Added enemies to 2nd Bossfight [/size]

[size=2]1.6.0 - Sunday 6/28/2015[/size]
[size=2]Overhauled Type II Boss Room.[/size]
[size=2]Reworked elevator in final area.[/size]
[size=2]Reworked navmesh scheme in Scroll chamber. [/size]
[size=2]Added new loot in inner vaults.[/size]
[size=2]Reworked scaling in several NPC's.[/size]
[size=2]Cleaned for ITM's and error-checked with TESVedit.[/size]


[size=2]1.5.0 - 6/13/2015 [/size]
[size=2]Reworked two bosses, edited Boss room layout.[/size]
[size=2]Reworked enemy placement.[/size]
[size=2]Reworked loot placement.[/size]
[size=2]Added enemies in final section of dungeon.[/size]
[size=2]Added ambushes in final location. [/size]
[size=2]Fixed lava placement errors.[/size]
[size=2]Addressed issue where some users didn't have music playing in Boss Battles. [/size]
[size=2]All gates now open when required (after boss death).[/size]

[size=2]1.4.2b - 6/5/2015 [/size]
[size=2]Created optional version for low level characters.[/size]

[size=2]1.4.2 - 6/4/2015 [/size]
[size=2]Added Quest and Quest entries. [/size]
[size=2]Added new dungeon section. [/size]
[size=2]Added new Boss.[/size]
[size=2]Added Dragon NPC in ruin vicinity.[/size]
[size=2]Fixed minor errors in ESP. [/size]
[size=2]Slight rewrite of quest notes. [/size]

[size=2]1.2.0 - 5/31/2015[/size]
[size=2]Minor bugfixes.[/size]
[size=2]Slight changes to music control scheme.[/size]
[size=2]Addressed UDR records and disabled them. [/size]

[size=2]1.0.5 - 5/20/2015[/size]
[size=2]Minor fixes and balance updates.[/size]
[size=2]Released version with scaling for low-level players.[/size]

[size=2]1.0.1 - 5/19/2015 - [/size]
[size=2]Mod is in Release State. [/size]
[size=2]General polish and minor bug fixes. [/size]
[size=2]Added a Mechanical Dragon Guardian next to ruin. [/size]
[size=2]Overhauled lighting in 1 interior cell.[/size]
[size=2]Changed location of final Quest objective.[/size]

[size=2]0.9.0 - 5/19/2015 - [/size]
[size=2]Addressed lighting and optimization issues. [/size]
[size=2]Resized overall download by 80% from initial release (mostly WAV to XWM format switch). [/size]
[size=2]Addressed balance issues. [/size]
[size=2]Addressed manikin not abiding by Ai Packages. [/size]
[size=2]Rectified random loot on enemies. [/size]
[size=2]Added traps.[/size]
[size=2]Added Elevator Area. [/size]
[size=2]Added new Boss. [/size]

[size=2]0.8.0 - 5/17/2015 -  Preliminary Alpha version Uploaded.[/size][/center]
author: Di0nysys
